meanings: (연락·연줄 등이) be in touch (with), have connections[contact(s)] (with)
a place where one's nose reaches when one falls down
a place that your nose can touch if you fall down

vlive.korean: [어느덧 손만 뻗으면 닿을 거리] 손을 뻗어! [It's at arm's length] Stretch out your arm! 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY "TIME TO TWICE" EP.03
vlive.english: [It's at arm's length] Stretch out your arm!

vlive.korean: '혀가 코에 닿을 수 있습니까?' "Can your tongue touch your nose?" 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #17
그렇게 따지면 당신들 뒷발도 닿을 수 있어요! Then, your back feet can touch! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] N.Flying X CouchTalk - 엔플라잉 X 카우치토크
vlive.english: Then, your back feet can touch!

vlive.korean: [나연의 얼굴에 닿을듯한 손에 놀란 지효] 닿지 않았어? [JIHYO being surprised by her hand being too close to NAYEON] Was it okay? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV "Feel Special" EP.05
vlive.english: [JIHYO being surprised by her hand being too close to NAYEON] Was it okay?

vlive.korean: 닿을 듯 말듯 하기만 해도 이거는 뭐... If you can almost touch it, it's still... 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 14회 - 자기들끼리만 신나는 마마무 개인기 (갑자기 차력쇼..?)
vlive.english: If you can almost touch it, it's still...

examples.korean: Use shears with a long reach for cutting high hedges. 발음듣기 높은 생울타리를 자를 때에는 멀리까지 닿을 수 있는 전지용 가위를 사용하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Use shears with a long reach for cutting high hedges. 발음

examples.korean: Try to get home before dark. 발음듣기 어두워지기 전에 집에 닿을 수 있게 하자. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Try to get home before dark. 발음

examples.korean: When the sun’s rays hit the earth, a lot of the heat is reflected back into space. 발음듣기 태양 광선이 지구에 닿을 때 상당량의 열이 다시 우주로 반사된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When the sun’s rays hit the earth, a lot of the heat is reflected back into space. 발음

examples.korean: We hope to be there within the hour. 발음듣기 우리는 한 시간 이내에 거기에 닿을 것을 기대한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We hope to be there within the hour. 발음

examples.korean: Is the cable long enough to reach the socket? 발음듣기 전선이 소켓에 닿을 정도로 긴가요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Is the cable long enough to reach the socket? 발음
